name: VokabelStar Englisch für Fortgeschrittene
description:
VokabelStar Englisch für Fortgeschrittene is the successor of Vokabelstar Englisch für Einsteiger. The game aims to improve the English speaking skill on the levels A2 and B1. The German version also includes Business English. The game starts with the selection of an avatar (there are two types available) who guides the player through the game.

It contains 1980 words in 10 different themes and each of them has an own test to validate your learning progress. To ease the language learning 12 different mini-games are included. New in this version is "Own vocabulary", where players can set up three word blocks of 50 words. All words are editable and deletable to set new ones. Own vocabulary has its own theme test and is integrated in the game mode.

A bonus game with 8 variations and 75 achievements stimulates the player to use it on a daily basis.
